description: I really enjoyed playing Same Game. I installed ubuntu 2204 on a new computer. I then loaded Same Game. It is nothing like the version on 20.04. The ability to play different Same Game is not present. The ability to restart the game is not present. I am very dissapointed with the verision of Same Game
